name: BLOQOUT 3D - BETA
description:
Thank You For Choosing To Purchase, Download And Play Bloqout 3D BETA!

Match Bloqs of the same color to earn coins! Bloqout 3D BETA is an extremely addictive match-4 puzzle game where you must create rows and columns to win.

Compare to Cubicks!

Features

-3D Graphics

-Regenerate Bloqs

-Achievements

If you like Bloqout 3D BETA, be sure to like Divided By Zero Laboratories on Facebook and Twitter. Don't like Bloqout 3D BETA? Tell us why ASAP and we will do our best to make sure it's a game you love! Whatever you do, always remember that Bloqout 3D BETA is the puzzle game designed to keep you having fun!
